message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with visual question answering, which involves both computer vision and natural language processing. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a new method for answering questions based on images, which involves machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely sub-category. The paper also evaluates its method on benchmark datasets, which involves performance evaluation and comparison with other methods, making cs.CL (Computation and Language) a likely sub-category. The paper also involves attention mechanisms, which is a popular research area in machine learning, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely sub-category. Finally, the paper involves information retrieval techniques, as it deals with finding relevant information from images and questions, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible sub-category.
